attributes.action: The North of England should have an independence vote from Westminster
attributes.additional_details: To really level up the country.
attributes.background: It seems unfair that different parts of the UK have Parliaments or assemblies, to stop the ravages of Westminster on local populations, yet Northern England is under the thumb with no say (as is being proved at the moment), therefore it must be time to look at Northern independence.

rejection.details:
We have already published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Hold a referendum on creating a Devolved Parliament for Northern England: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555283

Hold on a referendum on an Independent North of England: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556284
